original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields up in mid-day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were up in the mid-day trade on Friday, while the rupee traded at 321.50 against the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 27.60 percent up from 27.30 percent at Thursday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2027 was quoted also at 27.60 percent up from 27.40/70 percent at Thursday’s close. (Colombo/ April 28/2023)
